spell_list.description: Grants the Prophet's spirit companion immunity to area effect abilities that do not directly target them. Every time the spirit companion strikes an enemy in combat, there is a chance that nearby group members can also avoid area effect abilities for a short duration, causing less harm to them.
spell_list.description_pvp: Grants the Prophet's spirit companion immunity to area effect abilities that do not directly target them. Every time the spirit companion strikes an enemy in combat, there is a chance that nearby group members can also avoid area effect abilities for a short duration, causing less harm to them.

effect_list.description: Grants your pet non-direct area effect immunity and a 15% chance (5% in PVP combat) to trigger this effect on nearby allies for a short duration.

spell_list.name: Spiritual Foresight
